PathOfBuilding.Notes:
For leveling progression of the ^xFFFF77passive skill tree^7, select relevant section in the bottom left of the "Tree" tab.
For leveling progression of ^xFFFF77gem setups^7, select relevant skill set at the top of "Skills" tab.
^xD02090- - - Gear priorities while leveling - - -
^7Use Strength Belt and Intelligence amulet to help with attribute requirements during leveling.
^xD02090- - When and where can you get important bench crafts - - -^7
^xAF6025Physical Damage to attacks:^7
I. The Sewers (Act 3) II. The Ossuary (Act 5)
^xAF6025Chaos Damage to attacks:^7^7
I. The Temple of Decay Level 2 (Act 7) II. The Ossuary (Act 10)
^xAF6025Chaos and Elemental Resistance:^7
Betrayal Unveil
^xAF6025Chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments:^7
I. The Ascent II. Map Recipe
^xAF6025Chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments and Stun:^7
Betrayal Unveil
_________________________________________________________________________
- You can use ^x70FF70Bloodrage^7 if you have enough sustain from life regeneration on your gear, have really good flasks or can hit often enough to recover your life through leech and life gain on hit but it does make you significantly squishier on hit build because you can often end up with no flask charges after a long fight
Regex:
-\w-.-|g-g-|-g-g|g-.-g|nne|rint
